import axios from 'axios' import Link from 'next/link' import { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react' import { useCookies } from 'react-cookie' import NavbarProfile from '../components/navbarProfile.component' import handlerUpdateProfileImg from './updateProfileImg.component' import GetItem from "./localStorage/getItem"; import { useRouter } from 'next/router' const UserProfile = () => { const [cookie, setCookie] = useState({}), [user, setUser] = useState({}), imgProfileRef = useRef(null), Router = useRouter() const handlerGetUser = async () => { const userData = await (await axios.get(`${process.env.API_PATH}/v1/user/${cookie?.user?.id}`))?.data setUser(userData) }, updateImgProfile = async e => { console.log(await handlerUpdateProfileImg(imgProfileRef.current.files[0], cookie?.user?.id)) } useEffect(() => { setCookie(GetItem('user')) handlerGetUser() }, [GetItem('user')]) return( <>

{user?.fullname} @{user?.username} token: {user?.public_token} Cuenta { cookie?.user?.auth?.user_verify ? 'verificada' : 'no verificada' } { !cookie?.user?.auth?.user_verify && ( Verificar ) }

) } export default UserProfile
